StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetO.cerContractGPAHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID int AS
SELECT H.OFFICER_CONTRACT_GPA_HISTORY_ID, H.CONTRACT_GPA, CONVERT(CHAR(11), H.CONTRACT_GPA_CHANGED_DATE, 106) AS CONTRACT_GPA_CHANGED_DATE FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT_GPA_HISTORY H WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE H.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID ORDER BY H.CONTRACT_GPA_CHANGED_DATE DESC, H.OFFICER_CONTRACT_GPA_HISTORY_ID DESC
